naslov: Samostojeća kuća u Sevidu, 70 m od mora!! (prodaja)
opis: Posredujemo u prodaji prekrasne, renovirane kuće u Sevidu! Kuća se nalazi samo 70 metara udaljena od mora, odnosno od plaže s kristalno čistim morem Sastoji se od 3 etaže: prizemlje u kojem se nalazi dvosoban stan te prvi i drugi kat koji čine dvoetažni četverosobni stan. Stanovi su nedavno kompletno renovirani, a kuća se prodaje kompletno namještena i opremljena. Kuća posjeduje i spremište od 20m2. Na parking stanu 3 automobila, a okućnica je uređena i održavana. Pozicija je idealna kako za turistički najam, tako i za ugodan boravak zimi i ljeti. Kuća posjeduje svu urednu dokumentaciju te je bez ikakvog tereta. Kontakt: +385 (0)99 244 6688 Milorad Lučić m.lucic@remax.hr Želite li posjetiti ovu nekretninu ili imate bilo kakvih pitanja? Kontaktirajte nas,rado ćemo Vam pomoći. Vaš Remax tim u Trogiru (Hrvatska). We are selling a beautiful, renovated house in Sevid! The house is located only 70 meters from the sea, or rather from the beach with crystal clear sea It consists of 3 floors: the ground floor with a two-bedroom apartment and the first and second floors, which are two-story four-bedroom apartments. The apartments have recently been completely renovated, and the house is being sold fully furnished and equipped. The house also has a 20m2 storage room. The apartment has parking for 3 cars, and the garden is landscaped and maintained. The position is ideal for both tourist rental and a pleasant stay in winter and summer. The house has all the proper documentation and is free of any encumbrances. Contact: +385 (0)99 244 6688 Milorad Lučić m.lucic@remax.hr Would you like to visit this property or do you have any questions? Contact us, we will be happy to help you. Your Remax team in Trogir (Croatia).
